name: Super Good Boy
description:
Something happened in the mushroom kingdom. What happened this time? Will Mario have to save the day again? Has he turned into a dog? Explore, solve puzzles, collect, sniff, dig, fight and make your way to the castle in this newest non-Nintendo game.

Info:

-Genres: action/puzzle

-Length: 1h30m

-No need RTP.

-Engine: Rpg Maker Vx Ace

Feel free to leave a comment below.
